column4: hi! how do i enable trash on an external hdd? since the user cant write to the root of the external hdd, they cant create the trash directory. where do i configure that? e.g. the rights which the temp mounts are mounted. do i have to add my user to some group?
you want a trash on an external HDD?
well because its my external data storage and it is GOOD(tm) to be able to retrieve stuff from trash if you accidentally delete it?
I thought that anything you delete went into the "regular" trash :P
the regular trash works per partition
so no trash on ext hdd
hmm, I just plugged my external drive and deleted a file. it went straight to the trash
I think you're trying to solve a problem that doesn't exist..
well nearly true. i386 is the most compatible
yes, but I don't think it matters on a modern system :)
i686 if your system supports it is nearly always the better choice
